hints.name: box.libs.scheduler.cron-job.scheduling-excludes
hints.description: Specify bean names of CronScheduler beans to skip during auto-scheduling. These should be the exact bean names as they appear in the Spring context.

values.description: Example: Exclude a specific cron scheduler bean.
Example: Exclude data synchronization cron job.

hints.name: box.libs.scheduler.quartz.enabled
hints.description: Controls whether Quartz scheduler integration is enabled. When false, all scheduler-related beans will be disabled.

values.description: Disable Quartz scheduler - useful for testing or when using alternative scheduling mechanisms.

hints.name: box.libs.scheduler.cron-job.scheduling-enabled
hints.description: Controls automatic scheduling of cron jobs at application startup. When enabled, all CronScheduler beans will be automatically scheduled.

values.description: Disable automatic cron job scheduling (default) - schedule jobs manually.
